dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Now, the bad Bloodfiends who want to hurt humans have all been driven underground.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Only the kindhearted, righteous Bloodfiends remain on the surface.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: They made a pinkie-promise with humans that they won't covet the human blood anymore! That they'd live peacefully, happily ever after together! Because what's better than peace, right?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: The bad, no-good Bloodfiends are crawling back up to the surface again!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Sneaking, slithering up to drink human blood!
